By Dark Phoenix on Wednesday, August 29, 2001 - 01:55 am:

NameTypeRangeGutsStatsNatureNotes
Rush SlashBasicLong10D/A/-/E-a
Dash SlashBasicLong17C/A/-/E--
Cut-in-TwoBasicMid12D/C/-/E-a
SwingBasicShort18C/C/E/E--
Flash SlashSharpShort18D/C/E/C--
Sword ThrowSharpExtreme25C/D/D/A--
Jumping StabSharpLong26C/C/E/BGood-
Twister SlashHeavyShort19B/D/E/E--
Slash ComboHeavyShort35S/E/D/E--
Rolling SlashHeavyExtreme28B/D/D/E-b
LightningHeavyExtreme26A/D/D/EEvil-
ThunderboltHeavyShort32S/E/D/EEvil-
Kick ComboHeavyMid19C/D/E/E-c
V SlashHeavyMid21C/C/D/C-d
Million StabsHitMid27C/A/D/E--
ChargeHitLong16D/S/E/E--
Air ShotHitLong30D/S/D/EGood-
Blast ShotHitExtreme40C/A/C/EGood-
Gust SlashHitExtreme19D/S/E/E-e
Triple SlashSpecialShort40B/D/D/C--
DeathbringerSpecialMid50S/E/A/E-f
Punch ComboSpecialMid45B/A/C/EEvil-


Tech Chains:

Rush Slash (30) -> Dash Slash
Cut-In-Two (30) -> Swing
Lightning (50) -> Thunderbolt
Air Shot (50) -> Blast Shot

Notes:

a - Basic starting move
b - Requires a POW of 300 or higher
c - May only be learned by Vesuvius (Durahan/Dragon), Hound Knight (Durahan/Tiger), and Kokushi Muso (Durahan/???)
d - May only be learned by Ruby Knight (Durahan/???)
e - May only be learned by Leziena (Durahan/Pixie), Genocider (Durahan/Joker), and Shogun (Durahan/???)
f- Reduces the Durahan's LIF when used
